title: SPARE
author: SPARE
content: I want to know to all you big cryptocurrency users if someone who is new to cryptocurrency wants to learn about cryptocurrency then what should he know first, the reason for saying this is because many new crypto currency users come to cryptocurrency and don't know anything.  By investing in cryptocurrency without understanding, they are losing all their property, so if you who are experts would say that before investing in cryptocurrency, you should know what things you should invest ?  Then the new crypto currency users would have benefited a lot, they would not have faced any losses as newcomers

comments.author: Nwada001
comments.body: Know what you are investing in, what the use case is, and how secured it is, not just some random project with a fake promise.Have a reason for investing, and then you need to learn the best way to protect your coins and where and where not to leave them for a long time.

comments.author: Luffygroove
comments.body: Certainly I'm no expert, but let me share my journey. Back in 2017, I heard about Bitcoin and started digging for info. I began by understanding the basics of Bitcoin, then naturally followed the current. That's when I realized Bitcoin was just one piece in the world of cryptocurrencies. It led me to altcoins, and as time went on, new things like NFTs and DeFi emerged. I just kept following the developments. I believe many folks, like me, kickstarted their crypto journey with Bitcoin. It was the buzzword back then, and from there, it's been a journey of continuous learning and adapting to the evolving crypto landscape.

comments.author: Gladitorcomeback
comments.body: Absolutely, without understanding the basic and fundamental use it's so risky to start cryptocurrency . Newbies should learn different things about crypto before diving into it.The most important thing which i will recommend to learn first is Basic Concepts of crypto currency. Newbies should learn about blockchain, decentralization, and cryptocurrency function. second I will recommend to learn about crypto wallet security, private keys/paraphrase and all tool which will safe the wallet. Besides these two major and fundamental thing it will be better to learn how to pick a good project by knowing the usecase of projects, risk management .

comments.author: Nheer
comments.body: Quote from: SPARE on December 08, 2023, 09:15:44 AMI want to know to all you big cryptocurrency users if someone who is new to cryptocurrency wants to learn about cryptocurrency then what should he know first, the reason for saying this is because many new crypto currency users come to cryptocurrency and don't know anything. That’s right, a lot of people just come into cryptocurrency without having any knowledge about cryptocurrency, some of them actually joins crypto because of the stories they hear about people making money from cryptocurrency, they just think they can also earn from it by just investing without carrying out research or knowing anything about it. Firstly, a person new to cryptocurrency should understand the risks associated with it and that it is not a get rich quick scheme because that is what new investors think of cryptocurrency. Due to the volatile nature of cryptocurrencies profit is not always certain and it has a 50/50 chance of either profit or loss. To be successful in crypto one needs to understand it to some extent and be able to apply those knowledge in order to be successful. People new to cryptocurrency should first and foremost seek for knowledge before investing any amount in crypto and also they should only invest an amount they they can afford to lose. How to protect their wallets and assets against frauds should also be taken into account, as this is one of the biggest risks that novices in the cryptocurrency space face in their early days. There are several threads on this forum discussing how to protect ourselves from scam attacks; if you browse around, you can find some useful information. Quote from: SPARE on December 08, 2023, 09:15:44 AM By investing in cryptocurrency without understanding, they are losing all their property, so if you who are experts would say that before investing in cryptocurrencyThis happens a lot but sometimes learning the hard way is the best way to learn. No one in their right senses will indulge in anything without having knowledge about it so investing without knowledge and losing their money will teach them a lot, it will teach them not to rush into things they are not knowledgeable about. I will cost them nothing to ask experts for guidance on the basic concepts of cryptocurrency and how to embark on their crypto journey.

comments.author: Lucius
comments.body: All those who think that cryptocurrencies are a way to earn something or even become millionaires should know that this is just a myth spread by those who invent various coins/tokens and need people who will invest in their ideas so that they can profit as much as possible. Projects without purpose and meaning, regardless of the fact that they promise everything you can imagine, should be avoided at all costs.Of course, there are always exceptions, but you should remember that these are only exceptions, and also that research has shown that 95% of people who trade with cryptocurrencies end up with only losses, so you should ask yourself if you have a chance to be among those 5%? In any case, all those who want to invest in cryptocurrencies should first of all invest their time in acquiring as much knowledge and gathering information as possible. Such decisions should not be made overnight or based on what a friend or acquaintance told you, especially if someone convinces you of something that at first glance looks too good to be true.When it comes to money and earnings, even those you consider reliable and good people can change a lot, because money changes people very often for the worse.

comments.author: Husires
comments.body: Every beginner must know and learn how to generate the private key correctly, that it be random enough and that no one can know the private key unless it is by reading the seed or that the seed is connected to a device connected to the Internet. Only then can you say that your money is safe and you can Consider buying Bitcoin, enhance your privacy and learn to trade.

comments.author: DYING_S0UL
comments.body: I am not an expert in bitcoin nor any other cryptocurrency. But I think everyone would agree that before doing an investing or getting yourself involved with crypto you must study the basic fundamentals first. There can be many things to know, many questions, many answers and many confusions. So in order to get the most of it you can use bitcointalk forum. It's a hub for crypto enthusiastic people. You cannot just come to crypto and start investing. That's not possible. First learn things like, how crypto are stored, what is a wallet, what is seed phrase/secret keys, what is a blockchain, What is multichain, how does a transaction work, what is gas fee, centralized and decentralized exchanges etc.

comments.author: Antotena
comments.body: Quote from: SPARE on December 08, 2023, 09:15:44 AMI want to know to all you big cryptocurrency users if someone who is new to cryptocurrency wants to learn about cryptocurrency then what should he know first, the reason for saying this is because many new crypto currency users come to cryptocurrency and don't know anything.  By investing in cryptocurrency without understanding, they are losing all their property, so if you who are experts would say that before investing in cryptocurrency, you should know what things you should invest ?  Then the new crypto currency users would have benefited a lot, they would not have faced any losses as newcomersUnderstanding crypto is not a rocket science if you follow proper learning and right information because you can seek for right information and get the wrong one and this can lead to wrong orientation of understanding crypto and with wrong information, you will most likely lose something in the end which is usually your crypto that you have sacrificed money to buy, you don't want to see one day that your hard earned investment has wash down the drainage, so here are what I think you should learn.Learn to differentiate between a custodial platforms and non-custodial platforms; hint: custodial platforms means you are the only person that has access to the private keys and the seed phrase as the case maybe, while non-custodial platforms are control by a middle person or third party as they called them. The problem with this platforms is that, there is 100% risk of losing your funds is anything happens later.Learn to differentiate between centralized exchanges and decentralized exchanges, this will help you a lot and also avoid exchanges that are non-custodial in nature because you can't hold the private keys or seed phrase to your coins.Learn to understand hardware wallet, software wallet and airgap device to store and manage your coins, each has its own advantage but hardware wallet and airgap device offer more conveniency and top notch security.

comments.body: As an early adopter, the main goal of getting into crypto is of course wanting to know more about crypto and being able to benefit from crypto.
